text:
Alright, email sent...!
Sorry to keep you waiting, Haruki────

────Huh...? Is it done...?
Sorry, I fell asleep~...

You think I was tired...?
I shouldn't have been, though...

Hmm... Producer-san,
is there something in the air that makes you sleepy?

When I'm with Producer-san,
I always feel kinda sleepy~
I wonder why... no one's ever said that to me before...

Haha, sorry...
I said something weird, didn't I...!
